SELECT u.id, u.c_username, u.c_pwd, u.c_phone, u.n_age, u.c_email, u.n_status, u.c_createDate, u.n_creater, u.c_updateDate, u.n_updater, CASE WHEN u.n_sex = 1 THEN '男' WHEN u.n_sex = 0 THEN '女' END AS tranfo_n_sex, r.c_roleCode, r.id as r_id, p.id as p_id, p.c_permisCode,
u1.c_username as u1_c_username, u.n_superior, u1.id as u1_id, d.id as d_id, d.c_departName as d_c_departName, d.c_departCode as d_c_departCode FROM users u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.n_userId LEFT JOIN sys_roles r ON ur.n_roleId = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON rp.n_roleId = ur.n_roleId LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON p.id = rp.n_permisId LEFT JOIN users u1 on u.n_superior = u1.id LEFT JOIN sys_department d on u.n_departmentId = d.id WHERE u.c_username = #{c_username} and u.n_deleted=0

select u.id, u.c_username, u.c_phone , u.n_age,u.c_email, case when u.n_sex=1 then '男' when u.n_sex=0 then '女' end as tranfo_n_sex , case when u.n_status=1 then '可用' when u.n_status=0 then '锁定' end as n_status ,, d.id as d_id, d.c_departName as d_c_departName, d.c_departCode as d_c_departCode from users u LEFT JOIN sys_department d on u.n_departmentId = d.id where u.n_deleted=0 and c_username like CONCAT('%',#{user.c_username},'%') and c_phone like CONCAT('%',#{user.c_phone},'%') and c_email like CONCAT('%',#{user.c_email},'%') and n_age = #{user.n_age} and n_sex = #{user.n_sex} and substr(c_createDate,1,10) = #{user.c_createDate} and substr(c_updateDate,1,10) = #{user.c_updateDate} order by id limit #{page.index},#{page.rows}
